exclusion: Press once TriSensor’s Action Button, the Purple LED will keep solid until whole network processing is complete. If the exclusion is successful, the LED will flash white -> green - >white -> green and then LED will pulse a blue. If failed, the yellow LED lasts for 30 seconds, then the green LED flashes once.
inclusion: Press once TriSensor’s Action Button. If it is the first installation, the yellow LED will keep solid until whole network processing is complete. If successful, the LED will flash white -> green -> white -> green, after 2 seconds finished. If failed, the yellow LED lasts for 30 seconds, then the green LED flashes once. If it is the S2 encryption network, please enter the first 5 digits of DSK.
label: ZWA005
overview: Aeotec TriSensor is a universal Z-Wave Plus compatible product, consists of temperature, lighting and motion sensors, powered by a CR123A battery. It can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications. By the built-in motion sensor, an alarm will be sent to the gateway when the motion sensor is triggered.
usage:
Factory reset

  1. Power up the device.
  2. Press and hold the button for 15s until Red Led is blinking,then release the button.

Note: Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.
wakeup: Press and hold the button at least 2s until Red Led is on and then release the button,device will send wakeup notification to controller if device is in a Z-Wave network.

parameters.label: Motion Retrigger Time
parameters.description: Delay before the motion event can be re-triggered
parameters.overview: This parameter is configured the delay time before PIR sensor can be triggered again to reset motion timeout counter.

parameters.label: Motion Clear Time
parameters.description: Time until the motion event is cleared
parameters.overview: This parameter is configured the time to clear motion event after a motion event detected. Time to motion clear, the device will send a clear event report to controller and send BASIC_SET= 0x00 to nodes associated in group 2.

parameters.label: Motion Sensitivity
parameters.description: Motion sensor sensitivity on a scale from 1-11
parameters.overview: This parameter is configured the sensitivity that motion detect.

parameters.label: Motion Sensor Report Mode
parameters.description: Sets the report to send when motion is detected

parameters.label: Send BASIC_SET to Associated nodes
parameters.description: Send BASIC_SET when events are triggered
parameters.overview: This parameter enables sending BASIC_SET command to nodes that associated in group 2 and group 3.

parameters.label: Basic Set Value Settings for Group 2
parameters.description: Values to send to Group 2

parameters.label: Temperature Alarm Value
parameters.description: Alert nodes when temperature is above this value
parameters.overview: This parameter is configured the threshold value that alarm level for temperature. When the current ambient temperature value is larger than this configuration value, device will send a BASIC_SET = 0xFF to nodes associated in group 3. If current temperature value is less than this value, device will send a BASIC_SET = 0x00 to nodes associated in group 3.

parameters.label: LED Indicate Disable
parameters.description: Whether to blink the LED when motion is detected
parameters.overview: This parameter is configured the Led light on disable or enable.

parameters.label: LED Color For Motion Event Report
parameters.description: LED color when sending a motion event report

parameters.label: Led Color For Temperature Sensor Report
parameters.description: LED color when sending a temperature sensor report

parameters.label: Led Color For Light Sensor Report
parameters.description: LED color when sending a light sensor report

parameters.label: Led Color For Wakeup Notification Report
parameters.description: LED color when sending a wakeup report

parameters.label: Temperature Scale
parameters.description: Report temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit

parameters.label: Temperature Threshold Value to Report
parameters.description: Minimum temperature change to report
parameters.overview: Change threshold value for change in temperature to induce an automatic report for temperature sensor. Setting of value 20 can be a change of -2.0 or +2.0 (C or F depending on Parameter No.20) to induce automatic report or setting a value of 2 will be a change of 0.2(C or F).

parameters.label: Light intensity Threshold Value to Report
parameters.description: Minimum light intensity change to report
parameters.overview: Change threshold value for change in light sensor to induce an automatic report for temperature sensor.

parameters.label: Temperature Sensor Report Interval
parameters.description: Interval for timed temperature reports
parameters.overview: This parameter is configured the time interval for temperature sensor report. This value is larger, the battery life is longer. And the temperature value changed is not obvious.

parameters.label: Light Sensor Report Interval
parameters.description: Interval for timed light level reports
parameters.overview: This parameter is configured the time interval for light sensor report. This value is larger, the battery life is longer. And the light intensity changed is not obvious.

parameters.label: Temperature Offset Value
parameters.description: Adjustment for temperature measurements
parameters.overview: The current measuring temperature value can be add and minus a value by this setting.

parameters.label: Light Intensity Offset Value
parameters.description: Adjustment for light intensity measurements
parameters.overview: The current measuring light intensity value can be add and minus a value by this setting.

parameters.label: Light Sensor Calibrated Coefficient
parameters.description: Calibration coefficient for light measurements
parameters.overview:
This configuration defines the calibrated scale for ambient light intensity. Because the method and position that the sensor mounted and the cover of sensor will bring measurement error, user can get more real light intensity by this parameter setting. User should run the steps as blows for calibrating:

  1. Set this parameter value to default (Assumes the sensor has been added in a Z- Wave Network).
  2. Place a digital luxmeter close to sensor and keep the same direction, monitor the light intensity value (Vm) which report to controller and record it. The same time user should record the value (Vs) of luxmeter.
  3. The scale calibration formula: k = Vm / Vs.
  4. The value of k is then multiplied by 1024 and rounded to the nearest whole number.
  5. Set the value getting in 5) to this parameter, calibrate finished.

For example, Vm = 300, Vs = 2600, then k = 2600 / 300 = 8.6667,
k = 8.6667 * 1024 = 8874.7 ≈ 8875. In this case, the parameter should be set to 8875.

associations.label: Motion Alarm
associations.overview: Group 2 is controlling group, all nodes associated in this group will be controlled through BASIC_SET command by the device when device detects a movement event. Basic Set Value is decided by Configuration Parameter 6.

associations.label: Temperature Alarm
associations.overview: Group 3 is controlling group, all nodes associated in this group will be controlled through BASIC_SET command by the device when device detects a movement event. Basic Set Value is decided by Configuration Parameter 6.
